body:
### Welcome to my programming portfolio
My name is Peter Pretorius and I am a third-year Computer Science student at the University of Kwa-zulu Natal. What follows is a link to various Java projects I have worked on since I started my degree. A few of them were programming assignments that I was given, but most are personal projects, usually written to fulfill a specific need. They are listed in no particular order.

Disclaimer: A few of these were coded during my first year of study, and as such may contain code of questionable quality.

# List of projects
* [Game of Life](http://lunchza.github.com/Game-of-Life/)
                      -An implementation of Conway's Game of Life

* [JFormCreator](http://lunchza.github.com/JFormCreator)
                      -A drag-and-drop form creator for Java

* [Drug Lord](http://lunchza.github.com/Drug-Lord/)
                      -Recreation of an old classic

* [tIDE](http://lunchza.github.com/tIDE/)
                      -A full IDE (Editor, Assembler, Disassembler, Virtual Machine) for the t programming language

* [Series Organiser](http://lunchza.github.com/Series-Organiser/)
                      -Organises your series folders by enforcing filename consistency

* [Steve Chat](http://lunchza.github.com/Steve-Chat/)
                      -IRC-clone (Server and client)

* SimpleBots(Page coming soon)
                      -Pit simple programmable bots against each other in a user-made arena

* [VisualHDD](http://lunchza.github.com/VisualHDD/)
                      -Generates a visual representation of the contents of your hard drive
name: lunchza.github.com
